name: allo_relay_attenuator
description: Hardware volume control using Allo Relay Attenuator
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Hardware volume control using Allo Relay Attenuator with 64-step relay-switched attenuation. Supports hardware buttons and IR remote.
volumio_info.changelog: 4.0.0 - Complete rewrite for Volumio 4.x (Bookworm). Uses lgpio instead of WiringPi. Polling-based button detection.
